name: Project Light (Working Title)
description:
CONTENT NOTE: This game does contain alcoholic references.

Hello! This is a very early public demo of my upcoming game for LOWRES! It's not much, but it's a small demo of the first environment map in the game, as well as a preview of the Google Resonance audio engine.

The game is intended to follow the narrative of two families, both separated by a series of human tragedies, set apart by time.

Controls:

Escape => Quit/Close Game

WASD => Move

Move Mouse => Look

Left Mouse Button => Interact

Right Mouse Button => Back one dialogue during intermission/Cancel Interaction

F => Turn on/off Flashlight
